name: Machine-learning
tagline: Class submissions for the Machine Learning course (Data Science series at JHU)
body:
##### Welcome to Ravi Shankar's Machine learning Course Page. It links to the Github site for the online course.

This page does not show-case the .html page (ran out of time) - sorry about that. 

You can download the zip folder from this page. Unzip the downloaded folder. Ignore the '....cache/html' folder. Right click on the only .html file in the folder and open with Mozilla Firefox/ Internet Explorer/ Chrome Browser. The .Rmd file is also available in the folder for you to open in RStudio. 

Thank you!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
